Virtovo was launched in December 2013 and our primary focus is on offering reliable KVM VPS at reasonable prices.  Over the short time that we've been offering service, we've seen growth from our initial Miami location to a new premium location of Vancouver and more budget focuses area in Lenoir NC.  We utilise Blesta for our billing system with VPS control handled through SolusVM.  We've invested in developing some custom code around this setup and offer the most feature complete control of your VPS from within Blesta itself.



We understand that sometimes it's desirable to have a cheaper product that can be used for testing or to provide backup/failover for a more critical service.  As such we've introduced a budget VPS product at a manageable price point.  To meet this price point these servers are not hosted on our standard configuration; however offer the following node specifications (Dual L5420 Xeon, 4 Disk HW Raid 10, 1 Gbps uplink).  Node density is lower than our normal offerings so still expect good performance.  Nodes are located with Dacentec Lenoir NC.  

Budget KVM VPS


1024MB RAM

2 Cores

50GB HDD

2TB Transfer @ 100Mbit

1 IPv4 Address

SolusVM

$4/mo | ORDER | Use coupon: LENLAUNCH

 

We do also still have our Vancouver launch special available.  Services are located in Datavault Vancouver with Peer1 + GTT Transit in addition to paid peering with cogent (no transit).  Nodes are 2 x E5-2620, 8 Disk LSI Raid 10, LACP Bonded 1Gbit uplinks.
